code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import ReduxThunk from'redux-thunk';import UserReducer from'../REDUCERS/UserReducer';import ContestReducer from'../REDUCERS/ContestReducer';var configureStore=function configureStore(){var store=createStore(combineReducers({user:UserReducer,contests:ContestReducer}),applyMiddleware(ReduxThunk));return store;};export default configureStore;
